MemberSignature.Value: public override void EndPlacement ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void EndPlacement() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub EndPlacement ()
public: override void EndPlacement();

summary.span: 使用户结束放置折线批注。

span.span: Ends the user placement of a polyline annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法结束批注放置操作由以前启动方法调用。This method ends an annotation placement operation previously started by a method call. 不需要调用此方法，因为当最终用户输入所有所需的点时，自动将结束放置。You are not required to call this method, because placement will automatically end when an end user enters all required points. 但是，它是有用时批注放置操作需要出于某种原因中止。However, it is useful when an annotation placement operation needs to be aborted for some reason.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath GraphicsPath { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath GraphicsPath
Public Overridable Property GraphicsPath As GraphicsPath
public: virtual property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::GraphicsPath ^ GraphicsPath { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::GraphicsPath ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::GraphicsPath ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置折线批注在运行时的路径点。

span.span: Gets or sets the path points of a polyline annotation at run time.

value.span: 具有折线形的 对象。

span.span: A object with the polyline shape.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 折线必须使用坐标相对于批注对象，其中 (0，0) 表示左上角坐标和 (100100) 表示批注的右下角坐标。A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation. 在设计时，应何时使用此属性不可访问属性改为。This property is not accessible at design time, when you should use the property instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置折线批注在设计时的路径点。

span.span: Gets or sets the path points of the polyline annotation at design time.

value.span: 具有折线形的 对象。

span.span: An object with the polyline shape.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 折线必须使用坐标相对于批注对象，其中 (0，0) 表示左上角坐标和 (100100) 表示批注的右下角坐标。A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation. 在运行时，应何时使用此属性不可访问属性改为。This property is not accessible at run time, when you should use the property instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsFreeDrawPlacement { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsFreeDrawPlacement
Public Overridable Property IsFreeDrawPlacement As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsFreeDrawPlacement { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定是否应使用自由绘制模式放置批注。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether an annotation should be placed using the free-draw mode.

value.span: 如果应使用自由绘制模式放置批注，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if an annotation should be placed using free-draw mode, otherwise .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持两个不同的位置模式时调用方法。Two different placement modes are supported when the method is called. 设置属性`true`从默认模式切换到自由绘制模式，允许使用自由绘制的同时将鼠标光标移动到用户。Set the property to `true` to switch from the default mode to free-draw mode, which allows the user to free draw while moving the mouse cursor. 若要允许用户能够自由绘制批注，您还必须设置属性`true`。To allow the user to free draw the annotation, you must also set the property to `true`.
